MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY8 postcode area of Leven, affecting properties in Main Street and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11.21AM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of repairs required to a section of our underground cable network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 2.52PM on 13 March 2021.
